title: Stage Lv5-P1-S04
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Little did I know that it was a trap.
Hardly had we started when it began to rain.
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Little did I know that it was a trap.
Hardly had we started when it began to rain.
Rarely have I seen such a case.

sentences.kr: 그 소식을 들은 적이 전혀 없습니다.
sentences.en: Never have I heard such news.
Scarcely had I arrived when the phone rang.
Seldom do I make such mistakes.
No sooner had I opened the door than the cat ran out.

sentences.kr: 그런 헌신을 좀처럼 볼 수 없습니다.
sentences.en: Rarely do we see such dedication.
